ui

Class TodayPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • ui.TodayPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class TodayPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Today Panel is the panel to show current weather for open weather map or Mars weather This object take signal from Main window
    Author:
    ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team8
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
